= Development =

=== Phase 1 ===

=== Use cases === 

 * User creates an address by digitizing a point
 * User imports addresses in various formats
 * User searches an address
 * User exports addresses

=== Implementation ===

 * PostGIS database
 * REST service for addresses amanagement: POST, GET, PUT, DELETE
 * REST service for data export
 * Mapping client

= Data =

 * Define data model
  * ID: Identifier
  * STREET: String
  * HOUSE_NUMBER: String
  * ADDRESS_EXTENSION: String
  * POSTAL_CODE: Number
  * CITY: String
  * LATITUDE: Number
  * LONGITUDE: Number
  * GEOMETRY: Point Geom
  * DATE_CREATED: Date
  * DATE_MODIFIED: Date
  * DATE_DELETED: Date
 * Support history
 * Convert data to WGS-84
 * Import data in PostGIS
 * Synchronize with OpenStreetMap
 * Free background data
